Package ausroulette.model.wheel

Class WheelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ausroulette.model.wheel.WheelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Wheel
    public class WheelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Wheel
    A concrete representation of a wheel of pockets in the Aussie Roulette game in the Further Programming Assignment.

    This implements the interface Wheel.

    Maintains a collection of Pocket and using the methods described in this interface provides functionality of turning wheel from one pocket to the next.

    Author:
    YOU!
    See Also:
    Wheel, Pocket, PocketColor

        public int generateRandomNumber()
        Description copied from interface: Wheel
        Generates a random pocket number. Returned number is between 0 and Wheel.LARGEST_NUMBER inclusive.
        Specified by:

      • nextPocket

        public Pocket nextPocket()
        Description copied from interface: Wheel
        Advances the wheel to the next pocket and returns the pocket at that position.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

        See Also:

      • generateWheel

        public static java.util.List<Pocket> generateWheel()
        A static helper method used in generation of the wheel and in testing.

        This method generates a List of Pockets based on the order in Wheel.POCKET_NUMBERS. Aside from pocket #0, whose PocketColor is PocketColor.GREEN the colors alternate between PocketColor.RED and PocketColor.BLACK.

        Returns:
        a List of Pockets
        See Also:
        Wheel.POCKET_NUMBERS, PocketColor
